rules.description: Post left_ctrl when return_or_enter is hold.
Post escape if caps is pressed alone, left_ctrl otherwise
Numeric Keypad Mode [Tab as trigger key]
Use left_command+j/k to switch tabs in an application.
Use left_command+h/l for back/forward in an application.

to.shell_command: open -a mail && open -a calendar && open -a reminders && open -a Microsoft\ Teams
osascript -e 'quit app "Calendar"' && osascript -e 'quit app "Mail"' && osascript -e 'quit app "Reminders"' && osascript -e 'quit app "Microsoft Teams"'

rules.description: Quit application by pressing command-q twice

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to shut down'

osascript -e 'tell application "iTunes"' -e 'set vol to sound volume' -e 'set vol to vol - 5' -e 'if vol is less than 0 then' -e 'set vol to 0' -e 'end if' -e 'set the sound volume to vol' -e 'end tell'

osascript -e 'tell application "iTunes"' -e 'set vol to sound volume' -e 'set vol to vol + 5' -e 'if vol is greater than 100 then' -e 'set vol to 100' -e 'end if' -e 'set the sound volume to vol' -e 'end tell'

rules.description: Evan's Vi Mode [D as Trigger Key & D+S for OS navigation]
Activate Terminal <left shift + left command + spacebar>

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "IntelliJ IDEA CE" to activate'

rules.description: Post left_ctrl when return_or_enter is hold.
